content: in this episode I completely and utterly sell out let's get to it
okay before you call me Judas let me regale you with the tale of how this all
came to be I've got a script down here so I apologize if I keep looking down at
it back in March of this year 2016 if you're seeing this in the future
over on the DM z-- craft forum a user named Jennifer began experimenting with
3d printer model files based on my one and a quarter inch tile designs few
other very cool people joined in and they were experimenting with some new
ideas and permutations and it was really neat to watch
I don't own a 3d printer I saw one in action once a friend of mine had one
that's the extent of my experience with them nonetheless it was it was a cool
project to see so for a while that's all it was but then I stumbled across some
other things in the internet that piqued my interest I noticed one Kickstarter in
particular that they got over a hundred thousand dollars in pledges to produce
3d printed model files so clearly there's a market for this stuff and that
got the wheels turning a little bit so I spoke to that team of modelers over on
the forum and add some conversations with each of them one on one but
ultimately it was horrific who had the most comprehensive and rapidly produced
set so he and I went into this joint venture as all my geeky endeavors fall
under the while ax armory brand kuroh Finn has the heroes hoard moniker
if you will so be looking for that in the near future
Ryan Curran is a supremely talented artist and a very capable 3d modeler
also a hell of a great guy so you're gonna see a lot of epic stuff from
heroes for the near future but the first big thing is this joint venture with him
and myself we hope it to be a long and successful partnership so if you're a
crafter who likes my stuff but maybe you don't have the requisite metric tons of
patients that are sometimes required for it and if you are into 3d printing
you can now get the officially sanctioned so-called why lock tiles and
clip-on features for your home 3d printer and they're called true tiles
tiles without compromise now we've launched you can go get them
right now as we speak we're starting out on drive through RPG for distribution
where we have two listings currently one of them is a small free sample pack it's
got a few models in there you can print them out test the quality make sure you
know what you're getting and if you're ready you can go for the full base
dungeon pack which is also on drive-through for 895 us now some
pre-emptive faq answers will there be more yes our plan is absolutely to
produce more models in the future what are the usage rights personal use is
what's intended you buy it and you print it and you can use it to your heart's
content if you don't have a 3d printer and want to hire someone who does to
print them for you that's fine as long as that person doesn't retain the files
if you yourself are a printer for hire you can't purchase the model files and
mass-produce them or even produce them and and sell the final product and of
course we hope that no one will share the models torrents that kind of thing
we've set our price very low by any standard and we're just a two-man
operation honest business will help us continue producing great new tilesets
and accessories hopefully for years to come will 3d printing start to appear in
Y lakhs crafting bits no cardboard and hot glue all the way my instructional
videos will always be about getting your hands dirty on rare occasions like this
one or maybe when we release new products I might dedicate an episode to
talking about it like I am right now but those will be few and far in between
this is the extent of it and the techniques that you and I use here on
wcv will never require a 3d printer period who is current so again you can
find him on the DMS craft probe towards the wood technique that I use in
so many of my videos came directly from him he developed the STL files that
you'll download if you buy true tiles so be keeping an eye out for the heroes or
brand in the future so I will place a link on the screen to the launch promo
that accompanies our our product release and that itself has the links to the
drive through our PG entries in case you're interested
happy printing thank you for watching I'm why lock and I'll see you next time
